animal.question: I say 'Meow!' and love to chase string. What am I?

hints.text: I like to drink milk.
I like to play with yarn.
I have soft fur and pointy ears.

animal.question: I bark and wag my tail. What am I?

hints.text: I like to chew on bones.
I go for walks with my owner.
I'm a good boy!

animal.question: I quack and swim in the pond. What am I?

hints.text: I'm often yellow when I'm little.
I like to eat seeds and plants.
I have webbed feet.

animal.question: I say 'Moo!' and give milk. What am I?

hints.text: I like to eat grass.
I can be black and white.
I live on a farm.

animal.question: I oink and like to roll in the mud. What am I?

hints.text: I'm often pink.
I like to eat corn.
I have a curly tail.

animal.question: I say 'Neigh!' and you can ride on my back. What am I?

hints.text: I like to eat apples.
I have a long mane.
People ride me.

animal.question: I chirp and fly in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: I like to eat worms.
I build a nest.
I have feathers.

animal.question: I have a long trunk and big ears. What am I?

hints.text: I love peanuts.
I am very big.
I live in Africa and Asia

animal.question: I hop and have long ears. What am I?

hints.text: I like to eat carrots.
I have a fluffy tail.
I like to hop in the grass.

animal.question: I am big and green and croak. What am I?

hints.text: I like to eat bugs.
I can jump very far.
I like to live near water.
